body.name: Persil Hidden Camera - Spy Camera - Nanny Cam - Best Mini Camera - WiFi Wireless Camera - Live Video Recorder with Night Vision - Surveillance Camera Full HD-1
features: HD 1080P Hidden Camera - Commonly used for business and home security as well as baby monitor, toddler indoor camera, pet monitor camera and used for motion detection recording to watch over elders.-1

Motion Detection - With upgraded motion detection, you can now manually set the sensor sensitivity on the app. Once motion is detected, you will receive an instant push notification with an image and can log into the app to see what's happening in real time.-2
Night Vision - The device to capture images in complete darkness. Most suspicious activities happen at night and this mini camera can be arranged accordingly.-3
Camera advantage - The perfect wifi camera to protect your home and important people. With a quick free app download, you can enjoy instant feedback from your camera from anywhere.-4
Easy to Use - Set up in minutes turn on the mini camera, connect to wifi and add it to the application. Designed for you to set up easily. No wiring required, no complicated installation.-5

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 1.9 1.9 out of 5 stars 25 ratings 1.9 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wireless monitoring Support for multi user viewing The camera can be connected to WiFi through the APP.Remotely view images through the APP , support multiple users to watch the same camera.share camera ID,invite friends to watch.

Upgraded HD Night Vision Night vision camera uses advanced HD lens , the light does not light up when recording, it will not expose the camera position, you can clearly see what is happening in low light or even total darkness. So you can see if someone is breaking into your home or business with the HD wireless camera, even when the lights are off.

Wireless Mini WiFi Camera 2023 Latest Smart Model Mini Camera This mini camera is portable and pocket , which makes it perfect as a wireless home security camera or a housekeeper/nanny camera/baby camera. Motion Detection & Real-Time Alerts Function Smart sensors to easily and quickly detect people, cars, pets and packages, and the security camera system can wake up in short time and capture all human movements. 1080P HD The new image sensor enables this camera to produce 1080P ultra-high-definition live footage with a wide viewing angle of 120° and a clear picture even in low light. Connected to the network (2.4GHz only), the security camera helps you remotely inspect your home 24/7 from anywhere.

Fast Plug and Play Indoor Outdoor just insert the SD、TF card, turn it on and choose the boot mode. For easier use of the camera. In the event of a sudden power outage or no network, the device recordsand loops the video locally

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lousy instructions, no clue about charging. Could not get red light to go out which defeats the purpose of a hidden camera. Could not connect to my network after an hour of trying. "free app" so why do they need my credit card info? Not a good feeling about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars would not recognize sd card; won’t format sd card
reviews.reviewText: first off, battery life is not desirable- perhaps an hour. this needs to be tethered to a power source. i guess for its size, cant expect much on battery. the biggest let down is that it wont read the micro sd card i inserted. tried a couple of different sd cards and still; no read. Both sd cards were formatted on my windows laptop but still not recognized by this device. tried formating the sd card using the device but it just times out and still does not see the sd card.cam works but cant record on the sd card. not good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to set up and can't be "hidden" with bright red light
reviews.reviewText: It took me a couple of hours to set this up. Picture quality not great and it can't be really hidden because of bright red light. It works thought

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 99% of the reviews are for Persil soap not the camera which is very deceiving. The camera would not connect to the internet after an hour of trying. I followed the instructions in the manual and the help video but it didn’t work. This product is trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I charged my camera over night for a good amount of hours and the battery dies in 2-3 hours not even of unplugging it not worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won’t stay on
reviews.reviewText: Picture is very grainy, night vision quality is poor and device keeps turning off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Look at app reviews first! Awful connectivity!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these mini cameras to ensure safety for a parent with dementia. I liked the idea I could use an app on my phone to make sure my mom was safe. The size of the cameras were perfect and they had a decent amount of “stars” at 4+. After struggling to connect cameras to the app and then hiding them at my mom’s, I returned to my house only to find they would not stay connected to the app. I ended up returning cameras. When I looked up app ratings it only had two stars. Make sure you look up app rating on any camera before you buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mainly for in the evenings and you can't even see anything with the nightvision setting. I tried adjusting the brightness and the other features but there is NO image to even be properly observed.Note: Set up and installing app was simple took me 10mins.
